title: Impact Network CEO on Racial Inequality
itunes:title: Impact Network CEO on Racial Inequality
description:
Bishop Wayne T. Jackson, Founder & CEO of the Impact Network, discusses how the coronavirus and racial inequality are impacting the African American community. He points out ways to reverse systemic issues.

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Doni Holloway

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
